questions.question: What does a red traffic light signal mean?
questions.explanation: A red light indicates that traffic must stop behind the white stop line or crosswalk.

questions.question: What does a yellow diamond-shaped sign indicate?
questions.explanation: Yellow diamond-shaped signs are used to warn drivers about upcoming road conditions and hazards.

questions.question: Who has the right-of-way at an intersection with no crosswalks?
questions.explanation: Vehicles have the right-of-way at intersections without crosswalks.

questions.question: When can you drive faster than the posted speed limit?
options: When you are passing another vehicle
When other traffic is driving faster
questions.explanation: You must always obey the posted speed limit and adjust your speed to suit driving conditions.

questions.question: Where should you NOT park your vehicle?
questions.explanation: It is illegal to park on a sidewalk as it impedes pedestrian traffic.

questions.question: What should you do when driving in foggy conditions?
questions.explanation: In foggy conditions, you should reduce your speed and use your low beam headlights to improve visibility.
